thread.title: BRIEF-Westjet Q1 Earnings Per Share C$0.32

title: BRIEF-Westjet Q1 Earnings Per Share C$0.32
text:
Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Westjet Q1 Earnings Per Share C$0.32 Reuters Staff
May 8 (Reuters) - WestJet Airlines Ltd:
* WESTJET REPORTS FIRST QUARTER NET EARNINGS OF $37.2 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.32
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.36 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY YIELD (REVENUE PER REVENUE PASSENGER MILE) 17.50 CENTS VERSUS 17.44 CENTS LAST YEAR
* QTRLY ASMS 8.029 BILLION VERSUS 7.699 BILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* QTRLY RPMS 6.810 BILLION VERSUS 6.393 BILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* QTRLY CASM, EXCLUDING FUEL AND EMPLOYEE PROFIT SHARE 10.57 CENTS VERSUS 10.30 CENTS LAST YEAR
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE C$1,191.7 MILLION VERSUS C$1,114.7 MILLION * QTRLY LOAD FACTOR 84.8 PERCENT VERSUS 83.0 PERCENT
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW C$1.20 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
